description: Lucas Entertainment presents Tomas Lopez in this 59-second clip! When a smile crawls across Tomas Lopez’s face it’s impossible not to notice just how adorable this guy really is. Not only is he cute, but he’s got a beautiful body and an impressive uncut cock between his legs too. And when he turns around you’ll see that his ass is pure artwork; it cries out for a fucking. Check out this preview of Tomas Lopez before his debut this Monday, 12 January 2015!
title: Lucas Entertainment Presents Tomas Lopez
